abstract: Simply Hired, a job aggregator and search engine raised $4.6 million in a Series D round of funding, The Silicon Valley/San Jose Business Journal reported. The company will use the money to add an East Coast office and make more hires itself.
snippet: Simply Hired, a job aggregator and search engine raised $4.6 million in a Series D round of funding, The Silicon Valley/San Jose Business Journal reported. The company will use the money to add an East Coast office and make more hires itself.
lead_paragraph: Simply Hired, a job aggregator and search engine, raised $4.6 million in a Series D round of financing, The Silicon Valley-San Jose Business Journal reported. The company will use the money to add an East Coast office and make more hires.

headline.main: Simply Hired, a Job Search Site, Raises $4.6 Million
